Class HSQLDBNoSchemaAdapter

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
DbAdapter
public class HSQLDBNoSchemaAdapter
extends HSQLDBAdapter

A flavor of HSQLDBAdapter that implements workarounds for some old driver limitations.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Mike Kienenberger
